page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: {GUIDES Guides is on Fridays at 6.30-8.30.We play games and have sing songs.We wear a blue blouse with a navy blue skirt and a green tie. {ST.JOHNS At St.Johns we make beds,learn to take temperatures and to fold bandages.We make up plays and pretend someone is injured in case of an emergency.We pretend to do artificial rescusitation. {YOUTH CLUB On Mondays at 5.30pm we have Youth Club at the Village Hall.Sometimes we go outside and have a barbeque.In winter we stay inside.We go home at 7.30pm.
